content.title: Calvary Austin Internet Ministry Vision
content.heading: Internet Ministry Vision
content.p: The mission of the Calvary Internet Ministry extends the Calvary Chapel Austin mission statement to the internet:
Reach the lost by presenting the gospel using interesting technologies, such as RealAudio, RealVideo, Flash, discussion forums, and others.
Introduce the church and the Calvary Chapel Movement for those moving or searching for a church home
Present transcripts and audio/video archives of services for further study
Enabling the body to utilize their spiritual gifts electronically to become virtual missionaries
